title: "Incorporating Human Error into Machine Learning"
excerpt: "Scientists at the U.K.'s University of Cambridge, The Alan Turing Institute, Princeton University, and Google DeepMind are incorporating uncertainty into machine learning (ML) systems The researchers utilized established image classification datasets so humans could supply feedback and rate their uncertainty level when annotating specific images."
